points: 1. Watchlist Search : You can now search through watchlists on our Mobile apps  in Document Search.
2. We've improved our process for making new document sources accessible in our Mobile apps so you'll start to see minimal wait time when new document sources are added to the Sentieo platform
3. Accessibility to your Internal research and collaboration.
4. Document Search : Search Snippets are more intutive
details.heading: Features

points: 2. Improved search for Private Company data
3. Some document types are heavy; To help users manage data consumption and storage space, we added warning messages when those document types are selected for off-line syncing on our iPad app.
details.heading: Improvements
